column3: Sport;The Preah Khan Reach Football Club has signed Charlie Machell for a one-year contract. The player was formally on the under-18 youth squad at Newcastle United.------The 24-year-old started training at Newcastle United before moving to New York City in 2013
column4: playing for Wingate Bulldog and East Tennessee State University. Newcastle born Machell later moved to Thisted FC  in Denmark. In 2018
column5: he  signed a contract with 07 Vestur of the Faroe Islands.------He will be the Svay Rieng side’s fifth foreign player
column8: Yeon Gisung (also formerly of Crown) and Daisuke Kobayashi
